channel.title: Patternflow on chryb's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Patternflow on chryb's blog

item.title: User-Friendly Pattern Recognition
item.description: Currently, I’m working on an interesting project that started as an internal university internship. As the title implies, it has something todo with pattern-recognition, an app. can be described as pattern recognition as a service. I was very happy with the project task because even if I’m new to machine learning I’m very interested in it. I also like to build user-friendly applications and play around with some visualizations. So I decided to do it.
